---
title: "Scatterplot"
format: html
editor: visual
---

### Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

### Load data

```{r}
data <- read_tsv("../data/03_dat_aug.tsv")
```

### Scatterplot of Knock out OVCAR3 genes vs Mock OVCAR3 genes

```{r}
ggplot(data = data,
       mapping = aes(x = OVCAR3_KO,
                     y = OVCAR3_MOCK,
                     color = DEG_OVCAR3)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")+ #If trendline is wanted
  labs(title = "Correlation between Knock Out and Mock OVCAR3 genes",
       x = "Expression level of Knock out OVCAR3", 
       y = "Expression level of Mock OVCAR3", 
       caption = "Data from Ko EJ et. Al",
       color = "Differentially expressed genes") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "right")

```
